Articles.Content:
This is my first posting of a craft file. This is my Virgin galactic replica prototype. It uses B9 parts. I'm actually sitting down now to rebuild it using more B9 parts as I am not super familiar with the modular wing system so I used all stock wings. I'm going to change that with this build. Let me know what you think, I'm open to constructive criticism. Feel free to download it and give me your impressions. I do not have FAR installed as I'm afraid to change the game so drastically after having played it for 155 hours with out it.

.craft file: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_hZbueKhropRzhpZEhnZkZlYnM/edit?usp=sharing

Edit: I have since remade the craft using more B9 wings and control surfaces. I'm not sure I'm happy enough with it to post it here. Let me know what you think.

Edited February 7, 2014 by furysamurai72
fixing pictures
